name: get_animes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool animes.
Tool description: Get all data from your favorite anime, and the chapter or tomo of the manga or  the light novel that the anime adapted
API description: This endpoint allows for the retrieval of data about anime. The query parameters include q (the search query), limit (the number of results per page), offset (the number of results to skip), ascending (sort order), order (sort order), `media_type `(anime type), studio (studio name), source (source material), status (`currently_airing `or `finished_airing`), genre, season, `year_equal `(equal to a year specified), `year_less `(less than a year specified), `year_greater `(greater than a year specified), langu

year_greater.description: Find the animes with the year greater than the given one

media_type.description:
The media type of the anime.
They are:

- music,
- tv,
- ona,
- ova,
- movie,
- special

studio.description: Filter the animes by the studio

year_less.description: Find the animes with the year less than the given one

nsfw.description: Activate the nsfw content. If you don't want it, don't use it

status.description:
Filter the animes by the actual status of the anime.

- currently_airing,
- finished_airing,
- ` not_yet_aired`

limit.description: Limit the number of data recieved

q.description: Search for animes by title in English or Japanese.

genre.description: Filter the animes by the genre

sort.description: Specify sort order, True for ascending and False for descending.

offset.description: Recieve the data after the number of the offset.

season.description: Filter the animes by their season

fields.description:
Get the fields that you want.
Disponible fields:  

- * (to all data)
- id,
- title, 
- main_picture,
- start_date,
- end_data,
- synopsis,
- mean,
- rank,
- popularity,
- `num_list_users,`
- `num_scoring_users`,
- status,
- genres,
- num_episodes,
- source,
- studios,
- volume,
- chapter,
- light_novel,
- media_type,
- mal_id,
- broadcast,
- statistics,
- related_manga,
- related_anime,
- season,
- year,
- title_english,
- title_japanese,
- synonyms

year_equal.description: Filter by animes released in the specified year.

source.description:
Filter the anime by the source.
They are:

- manga,
- visual_novel,
- novel,
- `4_koma_manga`,
- book,
- card_game,
- game,
- light_novel,
- mixed_media,
- music,
- novel,
- original,
- web_manga,
- web_novel,
- visual_novel,
- picture_book,
- other

order.description: Order the data with the field tha you want
